title: INVENTORY / NOTE FROM THE FRIDGE
description: Read the note you found from the giant ice bear fridge in the doomed commercial area.

dialogueTree.title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note is written with a blue pen..."
dialogueTree.text: The note is written with a blue pencil on a piece of lined office paper. The kitchen magnets have left spots on its surface.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Does it say anything interesting?"..."
links.text: "Does it say anything interesting?" The lieutenant leans closer to read the crumpled note over your shoulder.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "This is tangential at best, but the..."
links.text: This is tangential at best, but the lieutenant's *detective instinct* is still active.

links.title: You: "Read the note."
links.text: Read the note.

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't..."
links.text: Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't believe the off-site copy is still here! The illiterate ginger kid keeps stealing stuff from the studio, so I had to hide it somewhere safe."

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: ""You'll find the filament memory wi..."
links.text: "You'll find the filament memory with the off-site copy in the frozen ice cream maker. Please take it home ASAP, it's important. I'd do it myself if I lived in a civilized place with a freezer. Take care, Sulisław."

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't..."
links.text: Someone has scribbled: "S, I can't believe the off-site copy is still here! The illiterate ginger kid keeps stealing stuff from the studio, so I had to hide it somewhere safe."

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: ""You'll find the filament memory wi..."
links.text: "You'll find the filament memory with the off-site copy in the frozen ice cream maker. Please take it home ASAP, it's important. I'd do it myself if I lived in a civilized place with a freezer. Take care, Sulisław."

links.title: You: "Who wrote that note?"
links.text: Who wrote that note?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sulisław... wasn't he one of Miss..."
links.text: "Sulisław... wasn't he one of Miss Luukanen-Kilde's coworkers?" He tilts his head. "I remember coming across this name when we were reading her personal log."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like someone from that radio..."
links.text: "Looks like someone from that radiogame company upstairs. I'm a little surprised they just left their property lying here."

links.title: You: ""Maybe they had to leave in a hurry.""
links.text: "Maybe they had to leave in a hurry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a plausible hypothesis.""
links.text: "That's a plausible hypothesis."

links.title: You: ""Maybe it's because of the Entity.""
links.text: "Maybe it's because of the Entity."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's implausible.""
links.text: "That's implausible."

links.title: You: ""Guess we'll never know.""
links.text: "Guess we'll never know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone who owns a radiocomputer?..."
links.text: "Someone who owns a radiocomputer? My guess is as good as yours, officer."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Which is to say -- not very good."
links.text: Which is to say -- not very good.

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "According to the note, someone name..."
links.text: According to the note, someone named 'Sulisław'.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wasn't he one of Soona's former cow..."
links.text: Wasn't he one of Soona's former coworkers?

links.title: Interfacing: "Perhaps someone who belonged to the..."
links.text: Perhaps someone who belonged to the defunct radiocomputer company?

links.title: You: "But why did they leave a filament l..."
links.text: But why did they leave a filament lying in a freezer?

links.title: Interfacing: "Sounds like a question for a detect..."
links.text: Sounds like a question for a detective, detective.

links.title: You: "That makes sense."
links.text: That makes sense.

links.title: Interfacing: "It would be *oh so* fun to try that..."
links.text: It would be *oh so* fun to try that radiocomputer out for yourself.

links.title: Logic: "Someone who owns a radiocomputer, o..."
links.text: Someone who owns a radiocomputer, one might assume.

links.title: You: "Thanks, smart ass."
links.text: Thanks, smart ass.

links.title: Logic: "You're welcome."
links.text: You're welcome.

links.title: You: "Makes sense."
links.text: Makes sense.

links.title: Logic: "It does, but who might that be?"
links.text: It does, but who might that be?

links.title: You: "What's a filament memory?"
links.text: What's a filament memory?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It belongs inside a radiocomputer,..."
links.text: "It belongs inside a radiocomputer, storing its memory. It's like a tape -- you listen to disco tapes, right? It's like one of your disco tapes, only for a computer."

links.title: Interfacing: "It's like the *production schedule*..."
links.text: It's like the *production schedule* you found, only this one's an *off-site copy*.

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note doesn't specify."
links.text: The note doesn't specify.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's part of a radiocomputer. When..."
links.text: It's part of a radiocomputer. When not in use, filaments are stored at temperatures below zero.

links.title: You: "Who's the illiterate ginger kid?"
links.text: Who's the illiterate ginger kid?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?" The lieutenant looks at y..."
links.text: "Really?" The lieutenant looks at you, the corner of his mouth curved into a smug grin. "You don't have a single guess?"

links.title: You: ""You mean Cuno?""
links.text: "You mean Cuno?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, I'm sure that child would *lov..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm sure that child would *love* to get his hands on a filament memory -- even if he doesn't know what to do with it. He'd probably try to pawn it for speed, based on our encounter."

links.title: You: ""No, no idea at all.""
links.text: "No, no idea at all."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm placing my bets on a certain r..."
links.text: "I'm placing my bets on a certain red-haired miscreant we met before. He'd probably try to pawn it for speed, based on our encounter."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some local miscreant probably. The..."
links.text: "Some local miscreant probably. There are tons of them running around in Martinaise, ready to stir up trouble. We usually dispatch our junior officers to deal with them."

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "The note does not specify."
links.text: The note does not specify.

links.title: Volition: "Are you serious? You sure you don't..."
links.text: Are you serious? You sure you don't want to hazard a guess here, detective?

links.title: You: "Oh, you mean Cuno?"
links.text: Oh, you mean Cuno?

links.title: Volition: "Ding, ding, ding! We have a winner!"
links.text: Ding, ding, ding! We have a winner!

links.title: You: "No idea."
links.text: No idea.

links.title: Volition: "Really? You sure it isn't a certain..."
links.text: Really? You sure it isn't a certain redhaired little gremlin who refers to himself in the third person?

links.title: You: "Are you talking about Cuno?"
links.text: Are you talking about Cuno?

links.title: You: "Nope. Drawing a blank here."
links.text: Nope. Drawing a blank here.

links.title: Volition: "The damage is truly extraordinary...."
links.text: The damage is truly extraordinary. It's a miracle you don't shit yourself.

links.title: You: "Where's the frozen ice cream maker?"
links.text: Where's the frozen ice cream maker?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know... I assume it's some..."
links.text: "I don't know... I assume it's somewhere close to the ice bear fridge."

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "Didn't you see a *melting* ice crea..."
links.text: Didn't you see a *melting* ice cream maker right next to the breaker box?

links.title: Logic: "And you *did* unplug the black wire..."
links.text: And you *did* unplug the black wire from said breaker box.

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "Didn't you see one right next to th..."
links.text: Didn't you see one right next to the breaker box?

links.title: A Note from the Fridge: "Somewhere among the shadows in the..."
links.text: Somewhere among the shadows in the cellar.

links.title: You: "[Put the note away.]"
links.text: [Put the note away.]
